Detailed Description

Packet used to get information from the map module about all excisting maps in the system.

The different types of requests are:

  • Get the mapIDs of all known maps.
  • Get both mapIDs and boundingboxes for all known maps.
  • Get the mapIDs of all loaded maps.

The format of the AllMapRequestPacket after the header in the RequestPacket is:
PosSizeComment
REQUEST_HEADER_SIZE 4 bytes The type of information wanted in reply.

Definition at line 44 of file AllMapPacket.h.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum AllMapRequestPacket::allmap_t
 

What information to send for each map.

Enumeration values:
ONLY_MAPID  Only send a list with the mapID's.
BOUNDINGBOX  Send the boundingbox for each map.
ONLY_LOADED_MAPID  Only send a list with the mapID's of the loaded maps.
BOUNDINGBOX_VER  Send the bounding box and the version-number for each map.
